FINALLY, IN AN ACT OF DESPERATION TO STOP WHAT WE HAD BECOME, I SET THE SHIP ASHORE ON THE MISSION COAST, IN A COVE WE NAMED AFTER WHAT WE WOULD SOON BRING THERE: CRYSTAL COVE. WE BURIED THE EVIL TREASURE DEEP, DEEP UNDERGROUND. I CONCEALED ITS LOCATION ABOARD THE SHIP AND ARTFULLY PROTECTED IT BY AN UNCRACKABLE CIPHER.
